Name: Little Devil
About the game: Little Devil is a horror game with Singleplayer and Multiplayer modes, played with 1 to 5 people. Jake has bought a house in his new home town. Their friends hadn't heard from Jake since he moved in. His friends went to his new home to look for Jake. When they came home, they realized that the house was not a normal house and that supernatural events were taking place in the house, and they were looking for a way to escape from the house. Will our main character Daniel find his friend and get out of the dangerous house? Read the clues in the house, collect the items and try to survive. • Single Player and Multiplayer • Realistic graphics and sounds • Mysterious places • Research
